Text: RE Map Request Cc Michelle It has been more difficult than expected to get a map with the power plant locations I will send you a map of the area with a general idea of the plant locations I will continue to work on finding a better way to make the exact locations Roger Original Message From Lokay Michelle mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Graham Roger Subject RE Map Request Sorry Smith Street EB Houston Texas Thanks Original Message From Graham Roger mailto Sent Thursday October PM To Lokay Michelle Subject RE Map Request Michelle Can you send me your street address and zip Fedex packages can not be sent to a PO Box address Thanks Roger Original Message From Lokay Michelle mailto Sent Thursday October AM To Graham Roger Subject Map Request Roger Please send me maps of your PGE system They can be mailed to Michelle Lokay co Enron P O Box Houston Texas These will be beneficial in our evaluation of future opportunities Thanks and again we enjoyed meeting with you guys last Tuesday Michelle Lokay Account Director Transwestern Commercial Group This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Pipeline Capacity Cc Michelle We enjoyed the meeting with Transwestern and appreciate your support for our Plan of Reorganization We are still looking at a purchase of pipeline capacity from PGE Topock to your connection with the South Point Power Plant The timing has changed from when we met in Houston At this time we will not be including this contract and service to South Point in our FERC filing However we would like you to review the following proposal dthday of firm capacity on the Transwestern system from PGE Topock to the Calpine South Point Power Plant The price is to be per dth consisting of per dthmonth reservation fee and per dth volumetric charge The contract will start with CGT acceptance of the FERC Certificate and continue to the end date of the Calpine contract which is the start of our Section rates We anticipate acceptance of the FERC Certificate at the end of Our Section rates would start mid to late The start of the contract is contingent on the following conditions PGE is issued and accepts an FERC Certificate PGE is allowed by the FERC to amend the delivery points in the tariff to include the South Point Power Plant and PGE has a contract with Calpine for deliveries to South Point Please let me know what you think Roger Graham Market Development Manager
